ygData.subject: RE: Spell Research Practice
ygData.msgSnippet: Research practice is a waste of time. You re better off saving money from loots  to use for practice points instead of looking for that stuff. Hiretsukan, 50
ygData.messageBody:
Research practice is a waste of time. You're better off saving money from
loots to use for practice points instead of looking for that stuff.

Hiretsukan, 50 Mage

-----Original Message-----
From: Shadowwalker [mailto:Shadowwalker@...]
Sent: Monday, November 01, 1999 9:10 AM
To: EQ_spell_research@onelist.com
Subject: [EQ_spell_research] Spell Research Practice


From: "Shadowwalker" <Shadowwalker@...>

Does anyone know what mobs drop Giant Bat Wings and Giant Scarab Eyes for
the Study practice rune?
I tried Giant Bats and Giant Scarabs in BB mountains, but they do not drop
giant versions of the wings or eyes.

-Shadowwalker

This list is intended for the trade of Spell components for spell research.
Please keep the emails on topic. Offensive remarks will not be tolerated,
no warnings. Apologies will be considered, but repeat offenders will be
banned permanently.
